amendment.description: An amendment numbered 156 printed in House Report 115-297 to support funding of the Infant Adoption Awareness Training Program to train pregnancy and health counselors regarding how to offer adoption as an option to women with unplanned pregnancies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A138) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A138) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A138) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
